Title: Episode 8
Plot: Sam learns that an operation is to be conducted on him in 2006 to try and revive him from his coma. However, he believes that to return to the twenty-first century, he has to betray his colleagues in 1973 - but can he regard them as real or imagined?
GuestStars: Tony Marshal (III), Noreen Kershaw, Ralph Brown, Jack Deam, Sean Gilder, Philip Lightfoot, Jacqui Boatswain, Mason Phillips, Judi Jones, Harriet Rogers (II)
